problem_names:
lemma ts_bit_stream_One:
  assumes h1:"ts x"
         and h2:"x i \<noteq> [Zero]"
  shows "x i = [One]"

lemma ts_bit_stream_Zero:
  assumes h1:"ts x"
         and h2:"x i \<noteq> [One]"
  shows "x i = [Zero]"

lemma ts_bool_True:
  assumes h1:"ts x"
         and h2:"x i \<noteq> [False]"
  shows "x i = [True]"

lemma ts_bool_False:
  assumes h1:"ts x"
         and h2:"x i \<noteq> [True]"
  shows "x i = [False]"

lemma ts_bool_True_False:
  fixes x::"bool istream"
  assumes "ts x" 
  shows "x i = [True] \<or> x i = [False]"

lemma ts_bit_stream_One:
  assumes h1:"ts x"
         and h2:"x i \<noteq> [Zero]"
  shows "x i = [One]"

proof (prove)
using this:
  ts x

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. length (x i) = Suc 0

proof (state)

proof (chain)
picking this:

proof (prove)
using this:

 1. x i = [One]

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<lbrakk>length (x i) = Suc 0; x i \<noteq> [Zero]; x i = []\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> x i = [One]
 2. \<And>a list.
       \<lbrakk>length (x i) = Suc 0; x i \<noteq> [Zero];
        x i = a # list\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> x i = [One]

lemma ts_bool_True_False:
  fixes x::"bool istream"
  assumes "ts x" 
  shows "x i = [True] \<or> x i = [False]"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x i = [True] \<or> x i = [False]

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. x i = [True] \<Longrightarrow> x i = [True] \<or> x i = [False]
 2. x i \<noteq> [True] \<Longrightarrow> x i = [True] \<or> x i = [False]

proof (state)
this:
  x i = [True]

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. x i = [True] \<Longrightarrow> x i = [True] \<or> x i = [False]
 2. x i \<noteq> [True] \<Longrightarrow> x i = [True] \<or> x i = [False]

picking this:
  x i = [True]
  ts x

proof (prove)
using this:
  x i = [True]
  ts x

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x i = [True] \<or> x i = [False]

proof (state)
this:
  x i = [True] \<or> x i = [False]

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x i \<noteq> [True] \<Longrightarrow> x i = [True] \<or> x i = [False]

proof (prove)
using this:
